title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The park posts current news releases online and maintains an archive of old news releases. All press inquiries should be directed to the public information officer at 703‑289‑2500. You can also find out about closures and construction, free activities, and long-term planning efforts on the George Washington Memorial Parkway.      Please visit Arlington House, Clara Barton National Historic Site, Claude Moore Colonial Farm, Glen Echo Park, Great Falls Park, Lyndon Baines Johnson Memorial, and Theodore Roosevelt Island for news about those sites .
